abstract: A campaign that is scheduled to begin on Monday presents the Intel Corporation as the problem-solver for the people who solve the computer network problems for others.
snippet: A campaign that is scheduled to begin on Monday presents the Intel Corporation as the problem-solver for the people who solve the computer network problems for others.
lead_paragraph: PURPORTEDLY perfect places go by many names, among them Shangri-La, Oz, paradise, Wonderland, Xanadu and Utopia. A major technology marketer is about to conjure up an ideal world called ITopia.

headline.main: Helping the Help Desk, the Intel Way
headline.print_headline: Helping the Help Desk, the Intel Way
